articles.author: Carly Thomas
articles.title: Fox Sports Analyst Mark Sanchez Charged With Felony Following Stabbing Incident - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The former NFL quarterback got into an altercation with a truck driver over a parking space in Indianapolis, leading to him getting stabbed multiple times, according to authorities.
articles.content:
Mark Sanchez, a Fox Sports analyst and former NFL quarterback, has now been charged with a felony following a stabbing incident in Indianapolis over the weekend that left him injured.
During a press… [+2738 chars]
